content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Good to meet you, Mr. Trabelsi. I appreciate your interest in the apartment. Based on my understanding of the market and the unique features of this property, I believe that a rental price of 800 Euros per month would be reasonable. What are your thoughts on this price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 800 Euros per month, Mister Heine. Thank you for your understanding.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Excellent, Mr. Trabelsi. I'm glad we could come to an agreement. Please let me know if you have any further questions or concerns before we proceed with the rental process.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Yes, I have one question. Can I move in on the 1st of next month?

I understand that I need to pay the first month's rent in advance, but can I move in on the 1st of next month?

Thank you for your time.

Best regards,

Aziz Trabelsi
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Of course, Mr. Trabelsi. You are welcome to move in on the 1st of next month. As per our agreement, you will need to pay the first month's rent in advance, which is 800 Euros. I will send you a payment reminder a few days before the due date to ensure a smooth transaction. Please let me know if you have any further questions or concerns. Best regards.
name: Heinrich Heine
